## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3e2fabcb8a6a015d5e97cb41a64571708efd64116ec0421079117fb5594a83d9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'phantom-labs-sandbox' @ 999.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
